title: No Potion Heal
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||Potions heal 50% of what they would normally.||Potions are less effective at restoring your health. |- |2||Potions do not restore any HP.||Potions cannot restore your health. |- | colspan="3" | Includes [[potion of curing]], [[potion of heal wounds]], and [[potion of ambrosia]].
Note that other effects (curing status, ambrosia MP regen) are unaffected. Also, [[Gozag]]'s effects are unaffected. |- | colspan="3" | '''Species information:''' [[Vine Stalker]]s start at rank 2. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Bad mutations|Bad mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Bad Mutations]] ==History== *Prior to [[0.27]], this was a 3 level mutation which reduced potion heal by 33% per level. *Prior to [[0.20]], this was called '''No Device Heal''', as it also reduced the effect of the [[wand of heal wounds]].
